text: Emerald Empire Hempfest is a cannabis festival in Eugene, Oregon, in the United States. The festival has been held on the third weekend in July since 2003. The event is free at attend. In 2016, the festival's executive director, Dan Koozer, filed a petition in Lane County Circuit Court after being denied permission to host the event at Maurie Jacobs Park. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 establishments in Oregon Category:Annual events in Eugene, Oregon Category:Cannabis events in the United States Category:Cannabis in Oregon Category:Recurring events established in 2003 Category:Summer events in the United States
title: Emerald Empire Hempfest
